programmes.show_description: Judge Rinder focuses on the deaths of six children in a house fire, and the murder of 67-year-old Rita Stephens in Penoced, Bridgend, for which police arrested her son Mark.
No programming information is scheduled at this time due to transmitter maintenance or normal station downtime.
No programming information is scheduled at this time due to transmitter maintenance or normal station downtime.
Miller is delighted when his old army pal arrives in town. Jack is jealous of the help and support Gina gives Bellamy.
Cassie hosts a handsome stranger named Henry along with Olivia, a visiting poet that she encounters; as the two begin to connect, a revelation threatens things.
NASA's cutting-edge Orion spacecraft is the next big thing in space travel. Hear how developers hope the module will aid human exploration of Mars and of asteroids.
The designers create a summer collection for Womenswear Week, but only designs that impress the judges and customers will be successful.
Jeremy Wade visits South America for a predator believed to be more fearsome than a piranha. Tipped off about an attack on a diver, he knows there is a real monster to find.
A couple in Burnley overcoming a recent burglary gets a nice surprise from the design team.
Poirot is unhappy to be asked to investigate the disappearance of a cook, but soon discovers the case may be worthy of his talents.
Brian Dowling and his design team are on a mission to prove that you can achieve the home renovation of your dreams without it literally costing the earth.
A former model and her husband run a luxury B&B and spa, but they are struggling due to falling guest numbers and the recession.
Marlon is furious. Paddy is determined to help his dad. Kammy and Ross match-make.
Sam checks his phone for evidence of Megan and Wills affair, Debbie vows to make amends to Carl, and Jodie stirs up trouble at The Kabin.
Nostalgic drama spin-off set in a hospital. Mr Rose's skills are put to the test in the field. Ken and Alun turn detective after a disastrous stag night.
Drama series about a Cornish detective. When a fishing boat sinks, killing one of the crew, Kersey and Lane discover a community struggling to keep its head above water.
Detective drama series. When a psychiatrist's wife is murdered in a frenzied attack, Wycliffe finds that proving a motive is harder than catching the killer.
Nostalgic police drama. A domestic dispute rages out of control, and Peggy's hold over David is threatened by a new arrival exerting her feminine wiles.
Demelza is beaten for trespassing when she defies George's power, which incites an angry mob; Elizabeth fears that George is not the father of her baby.
Mal locks Bernie in the cafe to declare his feelings; Debbie instructs Ronnie to transfer cash to Carl; Steve hears news of his dad for the first time in years.
Joe wants to seek revenge on Cain. Aaron reaches out to Bear. Ross reckons he has a fool-proof plan.
Members of Chicago Firehouse 51 put aside differences and drama to save lives.
The baby sitter of police captain Max Vernet's son suddenly dies; victim of a new and dreadful synthetic drug. Vernet has the idea to have someone infiltrate the network.
Judge Rinder rules the courtroom, but now the respected barrister with a background in criminal defence is stepping out from behind the bench to take on real-life cases.

Helen and Rob's wedding day arrives. The police are called in to deal with persistent noise complaints from a neighbour - but things soon take a nasty turn.
Martha gets reinstated as the mayor of Middleton, but she decides to try and pit Luke and Grace against each other; two best friends worry about drifting apart.
The Millau Viaduct is the world's tallest bridge and spans the valley of the River Tarn in southern France. Find out more about this marvel of modern engineering.
Ben Hillman and the team are in St Helens at the home of Eileen and Stephen Bennett.
The designers must impress the judges on lingerie week.
Jeremy rummages around for a contemporary "Jaws" in the Indian River Lagoon in the state of Florida; Jeremy investigates predators beneath the Lake of the Ozarks.
Nostalgic police drama. A domestic dispute rages out of control, and Peggy's hold over David is threatened by a new arrival exerting her feminine wiles.
Brian Dowling and his fashion-forward design team continue their mission to prove to the nation that it is possible achieve a dream home renovation at little cost.
Alex visits an understaffed and unfinished B&B in Somerset. The owner has sacrificed his personal life for the business and is in serious debt.
Joe wants to seek revenge on Cain. Aaron reaches out to Bear. Ross reckons he has a fool-proof plan.
Mal locks Bernie in the cafe to declare his feelings; Debbie instructs Ronnie to transfer cash to Carl; Steve hears news of his dad for the first time in years.
Tests on a teenage boy reveal a family secret; Ormerod and Weatherill find they are under investigation; and Goodwin shows Samantha how to relax.
A dead baby leads the team of Cornish detectives to the discovery of a bizarre pagan sect.
Drama series about a Cornish detective. Suspicion arises when a magistrate pal of Wycliffe's is found hanged. Suicide or murder?
Police drama. A latter-day Robin Hood is operating in the area and baffling the police. Blaketon and Ventress are divided over their latest private investigation.
The body of a drug addict is discovered face down in a river, and Vera finds herself forced to re-examine an old case from the past.
Jodie is tracked down by a girl called Olivia, Bernie threatens to report Mal, Maggie reminds Lauren who calls the shots, and Steve feels reluctant to visit his dad in hospital.
Kim convinces Joe to test Graham's loyalty. A farm emergency worries Cain. A euphoric kiss.
